name: Ho-Oh EX
author: Eske Yoshinob

abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may flip a coin. If heads, put this Pokémon onto your Bench and attach 3 different types of basic Energy cards from the discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rainbow Burn
attacks.effect: Does 20 more damage for each different type of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
